parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: PrefixListIds
parameters.description: The IDs of prefix lists to be queried. Valid values of **N** are **1** to **100**, which specifies that you can query up to 100 prefix lists at a time.

parameters.name: PrefixListName
parameters.description:
The name of the prefix list to query.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where you want to query prefix lists.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the prefix list belongs.
